text.headline: Chronological Notification & Response Timeline
text.text: This interactive timeline visualizes key moments when Mr. Arkaysia or authorities notified the church and the outcome of those actions.

text.headline: Mr. Arkaysia → Church
text.text:
First verbal request to lower volume during music teaching session.

Dismissed by Julian; said they would try, but made no changes.

text.headline: Mr. Arkaysia → NYPD (110th Precinct)
text.text:
Filed a noise complaint, NYPD visited after session ended.

NYPD verbally notified the church.

text.headline: NYPD → Church
text.text:
Church verbally warned by NYPD again.

Church continued noise at same level.

text.headline: Mr. Arkaysia → DOB
text.text:
Complaint about possible illegal conversion and zoning.

Partial vacate order and multiple violations issued.

text.headline: Mr. Arkaysia → Church
text.text:
Verbal notice to Cesar warning of legal action.

Cesar acknowledged and promised to mitigate noise; no significant change.

text.headline: Mr. Arkaysia → Church
text.text:
Sent list of DEP-approved sound consultants.

Minimal changes made (moved speakers); bass still leaked.

text.headline: NYPD (Neighborhood Coordination Officer) → Church
text.text:
NYPD visited church during noise event.

Officer stated no enforcement possible; church not fined.

text.headline: DEP Inspector Reynoso → Church
text.text:
Inspector recorded excessive levels during visit.

No fine issued due to claimed lack of jurisdiction.

text.headline: MEND Mediation Program → Church
text.text:
Mediation initiated and church informed again.

Minor adjustments; no real soundproofing implemented.

text.headline: DEP → Church
text.text:
Second DEP visit, church cited for violations again.

Church eventually started soundproofing in May 2024.

text.headline: Church (Julian via text) → Mr. Arkaysia
text.text:
Church notifies after beginning construction for soundproofing.

Soundproofing reportedly worsened low-frequency exposure.
